Uses of Package
org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver

  • Packages that use org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)
    org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver
    Template lookup, loading, and caching: Base classes/interfaces
    org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver.impl
    Template lookup, loading and caching: Standard implementations.
  • Classes in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver used by org.apache.freemarker.core 
    Class and Description
    CacheStorage
    Cache storage abstracts away the storage aspects of a cache - associating an object with a key, retrieval and removal via the key.
    MalformedTemplateNameException
    Indicates that the template name given was malformed according the TemplateNameFormat in use.
    TemplateConfigurationFactory
    Creates (or returns) TemplateConfiguration-s for template sources.
    TemplateLoader
    FreeMarker loads template "files" through objects that implement this interface, thus the templates need not be real files, and can come from any kind of data source (like classpath, servlet context, database, etc).
    TemplateLookupStrategy
    Finds the TemplateLoader-level (storage-level) template source for the template name with which the template was requested (as in Configuration.getTemplate(String)).
    TemplateNameFormat
    Symbolizes a template name format, which defines the basic syntax of names through algorithms such as normalization.
    TemplateResolver
    This class allows user to fully implement the template lookup, loading and caching logic, in case the standard mechanism (a DefaultTemplateResolver combined with all the Configuration settings like templateLoader, templateConfigurations, etc.) is not flexible enough.
  • Classes in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver used by org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver 
    Class and Description
    CacheStorage
    Cache storage abstracts away the storage aspects of a cache - associating an object with a key, retrieval and removal via the key.
    FileExtensionMatcher
    Matches the file extension; unlike other matchers, by default case insensitive.
    FileNameGlobMatcher
    As opposed to PathGlobMatcher, it only compares the "file name" part (the part after the last /) of the source name with the given glob.
    FirstMatchTemplateConfigurationFactory
    Returns the first non-null result of the child factories, ignoring all further child factories.
    GetTemplateResult
    Used for the return value of TemplateResolver.getTemplate(String, Locale, Serializable) .
    MalformedTemplateNameException
    Indicates that the template name given was malformed according the TemplateNameFormat in use.
    PathGlobMatcher
    Matches the whole template source name (also known as template source path) with the given glob.
    TemplateConfigurationFactory
    Creates (or returns) TemplateConfiguration-s for template sources.
    TemplateConfigurationFactoryException
    Non-I/O exception thrown by TemplateConfigurationFactory-s.
    TemplateLoader
    FreeMarker loads template "files" through objects that implement this interface, thus the templates need not be real files, and can come from any kind of data source (like classpath, servlet context, database, etc).
    TemplateLoaderSession
    Stores shared state between TemplateLoader operations that are executed close to each other in the same thread.
    TemplateLoadingResult
    Return value of TemplateLoader.load(String, TemplateLoadingSource, Serializable, TemplateLoaderSession)
    TemplateLoadingResultStatus
    Used for the value of TemplateLoadingResult.getStatus().
    TemplateLoadingSource
    The point of TemplateLoadingSource is that with their Object.equals(Object) method we can tell if two cache entries were generated from the same physical resource or not.
    TemplateLookupContext
    Used as the parameter of TemplateLookupStrategy.lookup(TemplateLookupContext).
    TemplateLookupResult
    The return value of TemplateLookupStrategy.lookup(TemplateLookupContext) and similar lookup methods.
    TemplateLookupStrategy
    Finds the TemplateLoader-level (storage-level) template source for the template name with which the template was requested (as in Configuration.getTemplate(String)).
    TemplateNameFormat
    Symbolizes a template name format, which defines the basic syntax of names through algorithms such as normalization.
    TemplateResolverDependencies
    Stores the dependencies of a TemplateResolver.
    TemplateSourceMatcher 
  • Classes in org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver used by org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver.impl 
    Class and Description
    CacheStorage
    Cache storage abstracts away the storage aspects of a cache - associating an object with a key, retrieval and removal via the key.
    CacheStorageWithGetSize
    A cache storage that has a getSize() method for returning the current number of cache entries.
    GetTemplateResult
    Used for the return value of TemplateResolver.getTemplate(String, Locale, Serializable) .
    MalformedTemplateNameException
    Indicates that the template name given was malformed according the TemplateNameFormat in use.
    TemplateLoader
    FreeMarker loads template "files" through objects that implement this interface, thus the templates need not be real files, and can come from any kind of data source (like classpath, servlet context, database, etc).
    TemplateLoaderSession
    Stores shared state between TemplateLoader operations that are executed close to each other in the same thread.
    TemplateLoadingResult
    Return value of TemplateLoader.load(String, TemplateLoadingSource, Serializable, TemplateLoaderSession)
    TemplateLoadingSource
    The point of TemplateLoadingSource is that with their Object.equals(Object) method we can tell if two cache entries were generated from the same physical resource or not.
    TemplateLookupContext
    Used as the parameter of TemplateLookupStrategy.lookup(TemplateLookupContext).
    TemplateLookupResult
    The return value of TemplateLookupStrategy.lookup(TemplateLookupContext) and similar lookup methods.
    TemplateLookupStrategy
    Finds the TemplateLoader-level (storage-level) template source for the template name with which the template was requested (as in Configuration.getTemplate(String)).
    TemplateNameFormat
    Symbolizes a template name format, which defines the basic syntax of names through algorithms such as normalization.
    TemplateResolver
    This class allows user to fully implement the template lookup, loading and caching logic, in case the standard mechanism (a DefaultTemplateResolver combined with all the Configuration settings like templateLoader, templateConfigurations, etc.) is not flexible enough.
